text: Thanks <@U0PB67X4K>. Do you know if this level of message encryption changes in V1 are documented yet? I’ve checked the SDK design doc and it refers to the signing keys, tCerts etc, but not encryption keys yet. Many thanks :slightly_smiling_face:

that's because we don't have encryption built in to fabric V1 at this point.  as you know V1 has channels to make sure that only nodes which need / are allowed to get the data actually get the data (as opposed to V0.6 where all validators saw everything)

we have some ideas on how we *might* do things at the application level, but we have to get everything else working for now
